values: Think It Not Strange: Fiery Trials and the Testimony of ChristThink It Not Strange: Fiery Trials and the Testimony of Christ

We should not be surprised or ashamed when we suffer in the name of Jesus. God refines us and displays the worth of Christ in and through our suffering.We should not be surprised or ashamed when we suffer in the name of Jesus. God refines us and displays the worth of Christ in and through our suffering.
